reviewText: Very good video.  Explains what he is doing very slowly and thoroughly, and nice to be able to see it demonstrated rather than just reading about it.  Really need volume 1, though, so will probably have to buy the set as I can't find it by itself, so kind of wasted my money buying this one as a single.
i have a large breed and she has arthritis and these techniques are easy to learn and help her. I will have to get the first one in the series but for now this will do.
